meanings.definition: A person whose power derives from their wealth.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy plutocrat owned many businesses in the city.
meanings.sent2: The plutocrat's influence in society was evident through their financial control.
meanings.sent3: The plutocrat decided to buy the entire town just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the business world like a powerful plutocrat.
meanings.sent5: The image of the plutocrat surrounded by gold coins stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: A member of the ruling class.
meanings.sent1: The ancient kingdom was led by a wise plutocrat.
meanings.sent2: The plutocrat's family had been in power for generations.
meanings.sent3: The young plutocrat accidentally spilled juice on the royal robe.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall among the other rulers, a true plutocrat.
meanings.sent5: The grand palace was where the plutocrat made important decisions.
